Amnesia.DESCRIPTION: When you Remember a card, if you have Amnesia, Exhaust the card and reduce your Amnesia by 1.

AWAKEN.DESCRIPTION: Remove the Forgotten condition from a Forgotten card anywhere in play, and add it to your hand. This does !bnot!b count as Remembering the card.

FORGET.DESCRIPTION: A Forgotten card's effect is hidden, and its cost set to 1, until played.

URGENT.DESCRIPTION: Urgent cards in your hand must be played before any other cards. If there are multiple Urgent cards, you may choose the order in which you play them.

REMEMBER.DESCRIPTION: Removes the Forgotten condition from a card and plays it.

WOOZY.DESCRIPTION: Creatures lose HP equal to their Woozy whenever you Remember a card.
